          <title>
            <string language="en">Amplitude and frequency  recorder</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Umfang und Frequenzschreiber</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Enregistreur d'amplitude et de fréquence</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Registrador da amplitude e da freqüência</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Registratore di frequenza e di ampiezza</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Όργανο καταγραφής εύρους και συχνότητας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Registrador de la amplitud y de la frecuencia</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Eighth of eight illustrations showing musical instruments of different sound frequencies and amplitudes. Shown here is a recorder.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">amplitude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Frequency</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">musical instruments</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">recorder</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sound</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Achtes von acht Abbildungen, die Musikinstrumente
der unterschiedlichen stichhaltigen Frequenzen und der Umfänge 
zeigen. Hier gezeigt ein Schreiber.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Huitième de huit illustrations montrant les 
instruments musicaux de différentes fréquences et amplitudes saines.
Montré ici est un enregistreur.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Oitavo de oito ilustrações que mostram 
instrumentos musicais de freqüências e de amplitudes sadias 
diferentes. É mostrado aqui um registrador.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un ottavo di otto illustrazioni che mostrano gli 
strumenti musicali delle frequenze e delle ampiezze sane differenti. 
È indicato qui un registratore.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Όγδοη οκτώ απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν μουσικά 
όργανα των διαφορετικών υγιών συχνοτήτων και των ευρών. 
Εμφανισμένο εδώ είναι ένα όργανο καταγραφής.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Octavo de ocho ilustraciones que muestran los 
instrumentos musicales de diversas frecuencias y amplitudes sanas. 
Se muestra aquí un registrador.</string>
          </description>
